questions.question: What does the DOCTYPE declaration do in an HTML document?
options: Informs the web browser about the version of HTML being used.
Defines the character encoding of the document.
Initiates the JavaScript engine in the web browser.
Specifies the CSS file linked to the HTML document.
questions.answer: Informs the web browser about the version of HTML being used.
